meanings.definition: A type of sandstone containing abundant angular grains of quartz, feldspar, and rock fragments.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the greywackes closely.
meanings.sent2: Hikers admired the greywackes along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The greywackes seemed to whisper secrets to the curious explorer.
meanings.sent4: The greywackes stood like ancient guardians of the valley.
meanings.sent5: The greywackes gleamed in the sunlight, revealing their history.

meanings.definition: Rocks composed of a mixture of sand-sized grains and rock fragments.
meanings.sent1: Miners extracted valuable minerals from the greywackes.
meanings.sent2: The beach was covered in greywackes of various colors.
meanings.sent3: The greywackes rolled down the hill, playing a rocky game.
meanings.sent4: The greywackes paved the path to a hidden cave.
meanings.sent5: The greywackes crunched underfoot, creating a unique sound.
